title: Tracking the Vaccine: Eye on equity in Chicago and Illinois
description: For six months, WBEZ tracked how Chicago and Illinois government agencies steered vaccines, who benefited and who didn't, documenting how systemic inequity in health care in Black and Latino communiti
cleaned_text: Tracking the Vaccine: Eye on equity in Chicago and Illinois by WBEZ Award Submissions published on 2022-02-10T18:56:29Z For six months, WBEZ tracked how Chicago and Illinois government agencies steered vaccines, who benefited and who didn't, documenting how systemic inequity in health care in Black and Latino communities left many behind. Genre Radio
